tiled.io
Interface MapReader

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.FileFilter, PluggableMapIO
All Known Implementing Classes:
MappyMapReader, RXDataReader, XMLMapTransformer
public interface MapReader
extends PluggableMapIO, java.io.FileFilter

Used by Tiled to denote a plugin for reading maps. The map file can have any format, as long as the MapReader implementor returns instances of Map and TileSet.

Method Summary
